Half Life 2’nin grafiklerinin Counter-Strike ile birleşmesi ile ortaya çıkmış efsanevi oyun. Oyunu kimi arkadaşımız beğenmese de oynayıp ta müptelası olan çok kişi var. Oyun öyle bir şey ki oynadıkça keyifli olan bir yapıya sahip. Counter-Strike 1.6 efsanesi gibi tutmadı ama oynayan belirli bir sağlam kitlesi var.

Nostalgia hits hard, missed playing old CS source, still as competitive and as casual as you can imagine. But never forgotten how much I missed old CS. The rush of getting into matches and just having fun is something you always look forward to, mindless at times, but fun nonetheless. This game has held up the old fashion enjoyment of just team battles, like Halo and other games which had multiplayer since the 2000s. 
Nevertheless having stopped playing the game for 12 years, has made me rusty, never stopped my enjoyment.
